definition: a heavy load and a long road/fig. to bear heavy responsibilities through a long struggle (cf Confucian Analects, 8.7)
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
heavy/serious/to attach importance to
to repeat/repetition/again/re-/classifier: layer

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
to distance oneself from (classical)
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: "Guinea's new leaders have important work ahead," Dufka said.
sentences.chinese: 几内亚的新领导人任重道远。

sentences.english: In my point of view, the wild animals were protected effectively still has a long way to go.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，要有效地保护野生动物，还任重道远。

sentences.english: Since the present condition of skilled workers is not optimistic, high vocational education has a long way to go under new situation.
sentences.chinese: 在新形势下高职教育任重道远，技工现状不容乐观。

sentences.english: Therefore, in order to bid farewell to Severe-Penalty Doctrine in China is still a long way to go.
sentences.chinese: 因此，要在中国告别重刑主义，仍然是任重道远。

sentences.english: This is a heavy-burden and long-way arduous task in the construction of an innovative country.
sentences.chinese: 这是建设创新型国家的一项任重道远的艰巨任务。

sentences.english: Today i am standing here, humbled, because i know that our climb will be deep.
sentences.chinese: 今天我站在这里，为我们将面对的任重道远而慨叹。

sentences.english: Asia-Europe cooperation has just started. There is still a long way ahead.
sentences.chinese: 亚欧合作方兴未艾，任重道远。

sentences.english: There is still a long way to go in the pursuit of durable peace and common development.
sentences.chinese: 实现持久和平与共同发展任重道远。

sentences.english: It will be a long and uphill journey to bring about a lasting peace and common development of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 实现人类的持久和平与共同发展，仍然任重道远。

definition: arduous/terrible (task)/very difficult/formidable
pressing in on one's eyelashes (idiom); imminent
circumstances require action (idiom); absolutely necessary/imperative
to brook no delay/to demand immediate action
see 急待[ji2 dai4]
the road one must follow or take/the only way
to be duty bound/to be one's unshirkable responsibility
to urgently need/urgent need
with great prospects for the future (idiom); well worth doing
to shoulder (a burden)/to bear/to suffer (a disadvantage)
in grave difficulties/the situation is grim
time and tide wait for no man (idiom)
general trend/irresistible trend
to have difficulty walking (idiom)/to walk with difficulty
at the present stage
arduousness/formidability/difficulty
